participant_1.background:
I'm always making delicious French fries for my family.
i want to teach kids in elementary school.
both of my parents are doctors.
I spend my days reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains, but I usually wake up late.
I went to an interfaith event last year, and it was really wonderful to see people from different religions come together in prayer.

participant_2.background:
I have always been close to my parents.
I am excited to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
I will not fight back, but I will stand up for myself and others.
I enjoy making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.

content.text: Hey there! I'm glad to meet you!
Hey! I'm glad to meet you too!
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to explore my new city and find new ways to style my curly hair.
That sounds fun! I love exploring new places too. Do you have any favorite places in your new city?
I haven't found any favorites yet, but I'm excited to keep exploring!
That's great! I'm sure you'll find some great places. What do you like to do in your free time?
I love making things for my pups and watching them enjoy them.
Aw, that's so sweet! I love animals too.
I'm staying home this weekend to avoid spiders.
Spiders are scary! I'm not a fan of them either.
I'm glad you understand!
Me too! What's your favorite mystery novel?
I really enjoyed the Girl on the Train.
I've heard good things about that one! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a great book.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love reading.
Me too! It's so relaxing.
It is! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I'm glad we have something in common.
Me too
